There he led an Augustinian seminary as rector, taught canon law to future priests, and served as a regional ecclesiastical judge and advisor<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=Prevost%20joined%20the%20Augustinian%20mission,13" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. This period ingrained in him a love for the Peruvian people – he traveled through jungles, mountains, and coastal regions, learning the language and culture, and eventually became a <strong data-start="3749" data-end="3780">naturalized citizen of Peru</strong> in 2015<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=said%20Francis%2C%20who%20leads%20the,of%20the%20Viatorian%20religious%20order" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3830" data-end="4379" class="">
<p data-start="3832" data-end="4379" class=""><strong data-start="3832" data-end="3842">1999 –</strong> <strong data-start="3843" data-end="3877">Augustinian Provincial Leader:</strong> Prevost returned to the United States in 1999 when he was elected <strong data-start="3944" data-end="3964">Prior Provincial</strong> of the Augustinians’ Midwest (Chicago) province<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=Trujillo,13" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. In this role, he oversaw the brothers and ministries in the region, gaining administrative experience. He handled challenges with steadiness – for instance, he cooperated with Church authorities to monitor an abusive priest under strict limits<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=In%202000%2C%20Prevost%20allowed%20Father,c" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>, reflecting a commitment to accountability.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4381" data-end="5275" class="">
<p data-start="4383" data-end="5275" class=""><strong data-start="4383" data-end="4398">2001–2013 –</strong> <strong data-start="4399" data-end="4442">Prior General of the Augustinian Order:</strong> At just 45 years old, Fr. Prevost was elected the worldwide head of the Augustinian Order (<strong data-start="4534" data-end="4551">Prior General</strong>) in 2001<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=In%202001%2C%20Prevost%20was%20elected,16" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. He served two consecutive six-year terms leading ~2,500 Augustinian friars in over 50 countries<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Prevost%20was%20born%20in%201955,and%20equality%20among%20its%20members" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=He%20later%20moved%20to%20Rome,Spanish%2C%20Italian%2C%20French%20and%20Portuguese" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. Based in Rome, he visited communities across the globe, promoting the order’s charism of community, education, and service. His leadership style was collegial and rooted in the Augustinian vow of obedience – he later remarked that doing whatever the Church asks “is the most difficult thing” but central to his calling<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.pillarcatholic.com/p/meet-the-conclave-cardinal-robert#:~:text=Prevost%E2%80%99s%20attitude%20was%20shaped%20by,%E2%80%9D" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">pillarcatholic.com</span></span></span></a></span>. Stepping down in 2013 after his terms, he returned to Chicago to assist in training new Augustinians<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=In%202001%2C%20Prevost%20was%20elected,16" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5277" data-end="6098" class="">
<p data-start="5279" data-end="6098" class=""><strong data-start="5279" data-end="5294">2014–2015 –</strong> <strong data-start="5295" data-end="5329">Episcopal Appointment in Peru:</strong> In late 2014, Pope Francis tapped Prevost to return to Peru as a bishop. On November 3, 2014, he was appointed <strong data-start="5441" data-end="5468">Apostolic Administrator</strong> of the Diocese of <strong data-start="5487" data-end="5499">Chiclayo</strong> (a temporary caretaker for the diocese) and Titular Bishop of Sufar<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%203%C2%A0November%202014%2C%20Pope%20Francis,8" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. He received episcopal consecration (became a bishop) on December 12, 2014, at the Chiclayo cathedral<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%203%C2%A0November%202014%2C%20Pope%20Francis,8" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. Less than a year later, on September 26, 2015, he was named the permanent <strong data-start="5823" data-end="5845">Bishop of Chiclayo</strong>, taking charge of this large diocese in northern Peru<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%203%C2%A0November%202014%2C%20Pope%20Francis,8" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. As bishop, he shepherded a flock in both bustling cities and poor rural areas, known for traveling to far-flung parishes on dusty roads to be with his people.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6100" data-end="6864" class="">
<p data-start="6102" data-end="6864" class=""><strong data-start="6102" data-end="6117">2019–2020 –</strong> <strong data-start="6118" data-end="6144">Growing Vatican Roles:</strong> While leading his Peruvian diocese, Bishop Prevost also gained wider responsibilities. In July 2019, Pope Francis appointed him a member of the Congregation for Clergy in Rome<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%2013%C2%A0July%202019%2C%20Prevost%20was,20" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>, recognizing his insight into priestly formation. In April 2020, he was asked to also serve briefly as Apostolic Administrator of <strong data-start="6490" data-end="6500">Callao</strong>, Peru – stepping in to govern that local Church during a leadership gap<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%2013%C2%A0July%202019%2C%20Prevost%20was,20" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. And in November 2020, he was appointed to the influential <strong data-start="6671" data-end="6699">Congregation for Bishops</strong>, which vets candidates for the episcopacy worldwide<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%2013%C2%A0July%202019%2C%20Prevost%20was,20" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. These roles signaled the Vatican’s trust in his experience and judgment.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="6866" data-end="8142" class="">
<p data-start="6868" data-end="8142" class=""><strong data-start="6868" data-end="6878">2023 –</strong> <strong data-start="6879" data-end="6909">Cardinal and Bishop-Maker:</strong> The year 2023 catapulted Prevost into the highest ranks of the Church’s leadership. On January 30, 2023, Pope Francis appointed him Prefect of the <strong data-start="7057" data-end="7082">Dicastery for Bishops</strong>, tasking him with overseeing the selection of bishops for the global Church<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=Dicastery%20for%20Bishops" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. He also became President of the <strong data-start="7231" data-end="7274">Pontifical Commission for Latin America</strong>, guiding Church affairs in Latin American countries<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=and%20was%20general%20of%20the,3" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. In this powerful position, he helped shape the future episcopate, identifying pastors who embodied Pope Francis’s vision of humble, service-oriented bishops<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.pillarcatholic.com/p/meet-the-conclave-cardinal-robert#:~:text=Prevost%20saw%20his%20task%20as,priests%20tapped%20to%20be%20bishops" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">pillarcatholic.com</span></span></span></a></span>. To enable this new role, he resigned his post in Chiclayo (becoming Bishop Emeritus). Francis then announced that Archbishop Prevost would be made a cardinal in the next consistory. On September 30, 2023, he was created <strong data-start="7784" data-end="7839">Cardinal-Deacon of Santa Monica (degli Agostiniani)</strong> in Rome, receiving the red hat and ring<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%2030%C2%A0January%202023%2C%20Francis%20appointed,the%20Catholic%20Church%2C%20raising%20his" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. The quiet missionary from Chicago thus became <strong data-start="7966" data-end="7986">Cardinal Prevost</strong>, instantly a prominent figure in Church governance and considered <em data-start="8053" data-end="8063">papabile</em> (a potential future pope) by observers<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=and%20was%20general%20of%20the,3" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="8144" data-end="9536" class="">
<p data-start="8146" data-end="9536" class=""><strong data-start="8146" data-end="8156">2025 –</strong> <strong data-start="8157" data-end="8182">Elevation and Papacy:</strong> In the months before the conclave, Cardinal Prevost’s stature grew further. In early February 2025, Pope Francis elevated him to the rank of <strong data-start="8324" data-end="8343">Cardinal-Bishop</strong>, assigning him the suburbicarian Diocese of Albano near Rome (a title of highest honor among cardinals)<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%206%C2%A0February%202025%2C%20Francis%20promoted,30" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. After Pope Francis passed away (or abdicated) in 2025, the College of Cardinals gathered to elect a successor. On May 8, 2025 (on the conclave’s second day), <strong data-start="8646" data-end="8693">Cardinal Prevost was elected the 267th Pope</strong><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%208%C2%A0May%202025%2C%20the%20second,33" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. He chose the papal name <strong data-start="8758" data-end="8769">Leo&nbsp;XIV</strong>, honoring the legacy of past Leos. The Protodeacon, Cardinal Dominique Mamberti, announced <em data-start="8861" data-end="8901">“Habemus Papam...Leo Quartus Decimus!”</em> to the world, and moments later Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV stepped onto the central balcony of St. Peter’s Basilica, greeting throngs of faithful in St. Peter’s Square<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%208%C2%A0May%202025%2C%20the%20second,33" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. In that moment, he became the <strong data-start="9126" data-end="9165">first American-born pope in history</strong><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=VATICAN%20CITY%2C%20May%208%20,unknown%20on%20the%20global%20stage" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span> (while also being the first pope with Peruvian citizenship). Global audiences saw a Pope who, unlike his immediate predecessor’s simplicity, appeared in the traditional papal mozzetta and stole, symbolically balancing continuity with a style of his own<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=following%20on%20from%20Leo%20XIII,33" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/post/2025-is-new-pope-cardinal-robert-francis-prevost-1st-american-chicago-elected-catholic-church-leader/16358670/#:~:text=Cardinals%20took%20two%20days%20to,peers%20during%20the%20secretive%20process" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">abc7chicago.com</span></span></span></a></span>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="9538" data-end="9867" class=""><button class="relative aspect-square overflow-hidden mb-7 mt-1 min-w-32 max-w-[22%] rounded-xl border-[0.5px] border-token-border-default float-image z-10 float-end clear-end ms-7 overflow-hidden"><div style="width: 100%; height: 100%; opacity: 1; transform: none;"><img alt="" class="bg-token-main-surface-tertiary m-0 h-full w-full object-cover" src="blob:https://chatgpt.com/5e76929f-6014-4fad-a923-b09e6f66f0a7"></div></button> <em data-start="9578" data-end="9866">Pope Leo XIV (Robert F. Prevost) waves to pilgrims from the balcony of St. Peter’s Basilica after his election on May 8, 2025<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%208%C2%A0May%202025%2C%20the%20second,33" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. As the first U.S.-born pontiff, his appearance was met with jubilation both in Rome and back in his hometown of Chicago.</em></p>
<h2 data-start="9869" data-end="9907" class="">Values and Contributions of Leo&nbsp;XIV</h2>
<p data-start="9909" data-end="11232" class=""><strong data-start="9909" data-end="9949">Missionary Heart and Social Justice:</strong> Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV’s formative years in Peru imbued him with a deep love for the poor and marginalized. He spent over 15 years among the Peruvian people, learning Spanish and embracing their culture so fully that he became a naturalized Peruvian citizen<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=said%20Francis%2C%20who%20leads%20the,of%20the%20Viatorian%20religious%20order" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. In parishes and villages, he was known simply as <em data-start="10287" data-end="10305">“Padre Roberto,”</em> the kindly missionary who traveled to remote areas to celebrate Mass and bring aid. A local Catholic leader attested that he is “very simple” and always ready to help others<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Jesus%20Leon%20Angeles%2C%20coordinator%20of,his%20way%20to%20help%20others" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. Prevost was a close friend and supporter of Pope Francis’s focus on the peripheries – he has been described as <em data-start="10631" data-end="10651">“a firm supporter”</em> of social justice initiatives, giving a <em data-start="10692" data-end="10740">“voice of common sense and practical concerns”</em> to the Church’s outreach to the poor<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Rev,commitment%20to%20social%20justice%20issues" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. In Chiclayo, he showed special concern for Venezuelan refugees who had fled to Peru, personally visiting and aiding these migrant communities in need<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Jesus%20Leon%20Angeles%2C%20coordinator%20of,his%20way%20to%20help%20others" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. This compassion for the vulnerable and commitment to <strong data-start="11061" data-end="11089">Catholic social teaching</strong> now continue to shape his papacy, as he calls for <em data-start="11140" data-end="11172">“compassion, unity, and peace”</em> in a divided world<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/post/2025-is-new-pope-cardinal-robert-francis-prevost-1st-american-chicago-elected-catholic-church-leader/16358670/#:~:text=Illinois%20Gov,new%20pope%20on%20social%20media" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">abc7chicago.com</span></span></span></a></span>.</p>
<p data-start="11234" data-end="13043" class=""><strong data-start="11234" data-end="11284">Augustinian Spirituality and Leadership Style:</strong> As an Augustinian friar, Leo&nbsp;XIV carries forward a rich spiritual heritage centered on community, humility, and interior devotion. He chose the Augustinian path in his youth because he valued the order’s stress on fraternal unity and the wisdom of St. Augustine<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.pillarcatholic.com/p/meet-the-conclave-cardinal-robert#:~:text=Once%20he%20was%20convinced%20of,Augustine%20of%20Hippo" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">pillarcatholic.com</span></span></span></a></span>. This background fostered in him a <strong data-start="11621" data-end="11655">collaborative leadership style</strong>. Whether as Prior General or as a bishop, he was known to lead as a <em data-start="11724" data-end="11733">servant</em> rather than a monarch. Those who know him speak of his down-to-earth demeanor: “friendly and warm” but never one to seek the spotlight<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Rev,commitment%20to%20social%20justice%20issues" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. A seminary classmate notes that he has a <em data-start="11950" data-end="11972">“wry sense of humor”</em> yet remains reserved and modest<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=attended%20seminary%20with%20Prevost%20and,in%20Rome%20in%20the%202000s" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. In fact, he often deflects attention – in Rome he avoided the pomp and social scene of the Vatican, preferring a simple life of prayer and work<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=English%2C%20Spanish%2C%20Italian%2C%20French%20and,Portuguese" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. <strong data-start="12229" data-end="12242">Listening</strong> is one of his hallmark traits: <em data-start="12274" data-end="12345">“He knows how to listen… even to the simplest or most humble person,”</em> one colleague observed admiringly<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Returning%20to%20Rome%20in%202023%2C,Vatican%20officials%20throughout%20the%20city" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. This patience and openness to others’ opinions have earned him respect as a consensus-builder. Even as he rose to high office, Prevost exemplified the Augustinian ideal of <em data-start="12592" data-end="12635">“one mind and one heart intent upon God.”</em> He embraced the tough virtue of obedience to the Church – when Pope Francis asked him to take on the daunting task of overseeing all bishops, he replied, <em data-start="12790" data-end="12879">“I will be happy; ...if you ask me to take on a new role in the Church, I will accept.”</em><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.pillarcatholic.com/p/meet-the-conclave-cardinal-robert#:~:text=Prevost%20told%20the%20pope%3A%20%E2%80%9CWhether,%E2%80%9D" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">pillarcatholic.com</span></span></span></a></span> This humble <em data-start="12931" data-end="12938">“yes”</em> to service, rooted in faith, now finds its fullest expression in his role as the successor of St. Peter.</p>
<p data-start="13045" data-end="15238" class=""><strong data-start="13045" data-end="13082">Theological Vision and Teachings:</strong> Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV’s vision for the Church combines evangelizing zeal with a spirit of inclusion and fidelity. He believes the Church’s first priority is to <strong data-start="13234" data-end="13280">proclaim a living relationship with Christ</strong>. <em data-start="13282" data-end="13426">“We are often preoccupied with teaching doctrine … but we risk forgetting that our first task is to teach what it means to know Jesus Christ,”</em> he warned in a 2023 interview<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=importance%20of%20evangelization%20to%20help,the%20Church%20grow" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. This conviction drives him to continue the New Evangelization: he urges clergy and laity alike to bring the Gospel to people where they are, in understandable and compassionate ways. At the same time, Leo&nbsp;XIV stresses that the Church must be a welcoming home for all. <em data-start="13765" data-end="13861">“Our work is to enlarge the tent and to let everyone know they are welcome inside the Church,”</em> he said, using biblical imagery of an open tent to signify a broad and inclusive Catholic community<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=,he%20said" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. This echoes his predecessor’s synodal approach of listening to the faithful. In fact, Leo&nbsp;XIV is expected to carry on Pope Francis’s practice of consulting laypeople and local churches on important decisions<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=Leo%20XIV%20is%20expected%20to,34" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. Notably, as head of the bishops’ office he supported the unprecedented inclusion of women in the selection of bishops, noting that it was <em data-start="14388" data-end="14467">“more than just a gesture… [but] real, genuine, and meaningful participation”</em> in Church governance<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/post/2025-is-new-pope-cardinal-robert-francis-prevost-1st-american-chicago-elected-catholic-church-leader/16358670/#:~:text=Asked%20about%20the%20contributions%20of,discuss%20the%20dossiers%20of%20candidates" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">abc7chicago.com</span></span></span></a></span>. In doctrine, Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV is considered a moderate, <strong data-start="14581" data-end="14618">upholding core Catholic teachings</strong> while seeking new pastoral approaches. For example, as a Peruvian bishop he spoke out against “gender ideology” being taught in schools, reflecting concern for traditional family values<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=as%20reserved.%20Then,34" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. He also has zero tolerance for clergy sexual abuse, insisting on robust protocols to investigate allegations and protect the young – yet humbly acknowledging “there is still much to learn” to purify the Church<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/post/2025-is-new-pope-cardinal-robert-francis-prevost-1st-american-chicago-elected-catholic-church-leader/16358670/#:~:text=offer%20at%20our%20meetings%20when,discuss%20the%20dossiers%20of%20candidates" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">abc7chicago.com</span></span></span></a></span>. This blend of <strong data-start="15109" data-end="15153">pastoral openness and doctrinal firmness</strong> defines Leo&nbsp;XIV’s theological outlook, as he leads with both compassion and clarity.</p>
<h2 data-start="15240" data-end="15312" class="">Legendary Character Profile: Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV – “The Augustinian Pontiff”</h2>
<p data-start="15314" data-end="15679" class="">In tribute to Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV, we can imagine him as a legendary RPG-style character – a wise and noble figure whose attributes and “special moves” have been forged through decades of service. Below is a character-style profile highlighting his titles, symbolic traits, and signature teachings, painting a portrait of a pope-hero standing at the crossroads of history:</p>
<h3 data-start="15681" data-end="15710" class="">Titles and Distinctions</h3>
<ul data-start="15711" data-end="17549">
<li data-start="15711" data-end="16109" class="">
<p data-start="15713" data-end="16109" class=""><strong data-start="15713" data-end="15765">Supreme Pontiff &amp; Bishop of Rome (2025–Present):</strong> Head of the Catholic Church and sovereign of Vatican City State<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=Pope%20Leo%C2%A0XIV,to%20lead%20the%20Catholic%20Church" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>, bearing the ancient titles <em data-start="15897" data-end="15914">Vicar of Christ</em> and <em data-start="15919" data-end="15951">Servant of the Servants of God</em>. Now known to the world as <strong data-start="15979" data-end="15995">Pope Leo XIV</strong>, he revived the name <em data-start="16017" data-end="16022">Leo</em> after more than a century, signaling a reign that values both tradition and renewal.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="16110" data-end="16452" class="">
<p data-start="16112" data-end="16452" class=""><strong data-start="16112" data-end="16145">First Pope from the Americas:</strong> Hailing from the United States (Chicago) with adopted Peruvian nationality, Leo&nbsp;XIV is the first-ever American-born pope<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=VATICAN%20CITY%2C%20May%208%20,unknown%20on%20the%20global%20stage" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=said%20Francis%2C%20who%20leads%20the,of%20the%20Viatorian%20religious%20order" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. His election broke centuries of precedent, bringing a “New World” perspective to the Chair of St. Peter.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="16453" data-end="16797" class="">
<p data-start="16455" data-end="16797" class=""><strong data-start="16455" data-end="16511">Augustinian Friar – 7th of His Order to Become Pope:</strong> An ordained member of the Order of St. Augustine, he is only the seventh Augustinian Pope in history (the first since Pope Eugene&nbsp;IV, who died in 1447)<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=Pope%20Leo%C2%A0XIV,to%20lead%20the%20Catholic%20Church" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. This connects him to a lineage of friar-popes known for austere living and scholarly depth.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="16798" data-end="17143" class="">
<p data-start="16800" data-end="17143" class=""><strong data-start="16800" data-end="16845">Former Prior General of the Augustinians:</strong> Before becoming a bishop, he led the worldwide Augustinian Order from 2001 to 2013<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=In%202001%2C%20Prevost%20was%20elected,16" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>, overseeing its spiritual and pastoral mission in 50+ countries. This role honed his global leadership skills and gave him the <strong data-start="17095" data-end="17117">“Legendary Cleric”</strong> status among his peers.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="17144" data-end="17549" class="">
<p data-start="17146" data-end="17549" class=""><strong data-start="17146" data-end="17185">Cardinal of the Church (2023–2025):</strong> Created Cardinal by Pope Francis, he was a key papal adviser and held the high rank of Cardinal-Bishop<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%2030%C2%A0January%202023%2C%20Francis%20appointed,the%20Catholic%20Church%2C%20raising%20his" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=On%206%C2%A0February%202025%2C%20Francis%20promoted,30" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>. As Prefect of the Dicastery for Bishops, he was the principal <strong data-start="17430" data-end="17448">“bishop-maker”</strong> for the Church, a role that elevated his wisdom attribute (and indeed his prominence as papabile).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="17551" data-end="17586" class="">Symbolic Traits and Qualities</h3>
<ul data-start="17587" data-end="20319">
<li data-start="17587" data-end="18102" class="">
<p data-start="17589" data-end="18102" class=""><strong data-start="17589" data-end="17609">Missionary Zeal:</strong> A tireless evangelizer shaped in the mission fields of Peru. Leo&nbsp;XIV spent years trekking through remote villages to share the Gospel, channeling the spirit of St. Paul. His experiences abroad gave him <strong data-start="17812" data-end="17854">100+ points in Cross-Cultural Ministry</strong> – he even became fluent in five languages and truly “at home” on two continents<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Prevost%20first%20went%20to%20Peru,role%20in%20his%20religious%20order" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=He%20later%20moved%20to%20Rome,Spanish%2C%20Italian%2C%20French%20and%20Portuguese" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. This global outlook now helps him bridge diverse cultures within the universal Church.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="18103" data-end="18556" class="">
<p data-start="18105" data-end="18556" class=""><strong data-start="18105" data-end="18128">Scholarly Canonist:</strong> With a doctorate in canon law and years as a seminary professor<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=Prevost%20was%20ordained%20a%20priest,11" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=and%20has%20a%20special%20focus,and%20equality%20among%20its%20members" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>, he is an erudite theologian. This trait grants him <strong data-start="18323" data-end="18346">Master-level Wisdom</strong> in Church doctrine and law. He can deftly navigate complex theological issues (a handy skill when drafting encyclicals or reforming Church norms) while remembering that law is always at the service of souls.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="18557" data-end="19127" class="">
<p data-start="18559" data-end="19127" class=""><strong data-start="18559" data-end="18585">Humble Servant-Leader:</strong> Formed by the communal ethos of the Augustinians, Leo&nbsp;XIV leads with humility and approachability. He prefers dialogue over commands, earning him the unofficial title “<strong data-start="18754" data-end="18774">Leo the Listener</strong>.” Colleagues note that he consults others and <em data-start="18821" data-end="18856">“knows how to listen to everyone”</em><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Returning%20to%20Rome%20in%202023%2C,Vatican%20officials%20throughout%20the%20city" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>, whether cardinals or the poorest of parishioners. His humility stat is bolstered by a simple lifestyle and a reluctance to take the limelight<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=attended%20seminary%20with%20Prevost%20and,in%20Rome%20in%20the%202000s" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span> – a refreshing contrast in an age of celebrity.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="19128" data-end="19741" class="">
<p data-start="19130" data-end="19741" class=""><strong data-start="19130" data-end="19149">Bridge-Builder:</strong> Having lived in North and South America and in Europe, he is a human bridge between worlds. Fluent in English, Spanish, Italian, French, and more<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=child%2C%20Prevost%20served%20as%20an,8" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span>, Leo&nbsp;XIV can speak to people’s hearts in their own tongue. This polyglot ability, combined with his biracial heritage and dual citizenship, gives him a unique <strong data-start="19494" data-end="19512">charisma bonus</strong> for uniting diverse groups. He’s equally at ease cheering for the Chicago Cubs<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/post/2025-is-new-pope-cardinal-robert-francis-prevost-1st-american-chicago-elected-catholic-church-leader/16358670/#:~:text=Prevost%2C%2069%2C%20from%20Chicago%2C%20Illinois%2C,pope%20from%20the%20United%20States" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">abc7chicago.com</span></span></span></a></span> as he is preaching in Spanish about Our Lady of Guadalupe. Truly a pope who can span the <strong data-start="19720" data-end="19738">global village</strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="19742" data-end="20319" class="">
<p data-start="19744" data-end="20319" class=""><strong data-start="19744" data-end="19769">Compassionate Pastor:</strong> Known for his <strong data-start="19784" data-end="19803">high Mercy stat</strong>, he has consistently championed the needy. From organizing charity drives in Peru to comforting migrants and the marginalized<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Jesus%20Leon%20Angeles%2C%20coordinator%20of,his%20way%20to%20help%20others" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>, Leo&nbsp;XIV carries a pastor’s heart. One friend said he remained a voice for <em data-start="20044" data-end="20081">“the Church’s outreach to the poor”</em><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Rev,commitment%20to%20social%20justice%20issues" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span> throughout his rise in rank. In RPG terms, this trait might be his special aura that heals and uplifts those around him, reflecting the Pope’s role as a father to all, especially the least of these.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="20321" data-end="20355" class="">Signature Teachings &amp; Quotes</h3>
<ul data-start="20356" data-end="22771">
<li data-start="20356" data-end="20780" class="">
<p data-start="20358" data-end="20780" class=""><strong data-start="20358" data-end="20383">Evangelization First:</strong> <em data-start="20384" data-end="20509">“We are often preoccupied with teaching doctrine... but our first task is to teach what it means to know <strong data-start="20490" data-end="20506">Jesus Christ</strong>.”</em><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=importance%20of%20evangelization%20to%20help,the%20Church%20grow" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span> This quote captures Leo&nbsp;XIV’s conviction that rules and doctrines, while important, must serve a living relationship with Christ. He urges the Church to prioritize personal conversion and the joy of the Gospel in all its efforts.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="20781" data-end="21260" class="">
<p data-start="20783" data-end="21260" class=""><strong data-start="20783" data-end="20812">A Church for <strong data-start="20798" data-end="20810">Everyone</strong></strong>:** <em data-start="20816" data-end="20916">“Our work is to <strong data-start="20833" data-end="20853">enlarge the tent</strong> and to let everyone know they are welcome inside the Church.”</em><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=,he%20said" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span> Using the biblical image of an open tent, he teaches that the Church must be inclusive and welcoming. No one should feel left out of the community of faith. This philosophy guides his approach to hot-button issues – focusing on mercy and accompaniment, inviting people in rather than shutting the door.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="21261" data-end="21768" class="">
<p data-start="21263" data-end="21768" class=""><strong data-start="21263" data-end="21304">Missionary Vocation of All Believers:</strong> <em data-start="21305" data-end="21436">“I still consider myself a <strong data-start="21333" data-end="21347">missionary</strong>. My vocation, like that of every Christian, is to proclaim the Gospel wherever one is.”</em><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/post/2025-is-new-pope-cardinal-robert-francis-prevost-1st-american-chicago-elected-catholic-church-leader/16358670/#:~:text=In%20an%20interview%20with%20Vatican,the%20Gospel%20wherever%20one%20is" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">abc7chicago.com</span></span></span></a></span> Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV insists that mission isn’t just for priests or religious in distant lands – it’s the calling of every baptized person. He models this by his own example, never losing that missionary fire even as Pope. It’s a rallying cry for the laity to take an active role in evangelization.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="21769" data-end="22771" class="">
<p data-start="21771" data-end="22771" class=""><strong data-start="21771" data-end="21807">Shared Leadership in the Church:</strong> <em data-start="21808" data-end="21894">“There is a real, genuine, and meaningful participation [of women] at our meetings.”</em><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/post/2025-is-new-pope-cardinal-robert-francis-prevost-1st-american-chicago-elected-catholic-church-leader/16358670/#:~:text=Asked%20about%20the%20contributions%20of,discuss%20the%20dossiers%20of%20candidates" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">abc7chicago.com</span></span></span></a></span> – <strong data-start="21936" data-end="21947">Leo&nbsp;XIV</strong> on including women in the process of choosing bishops. He has applauded Pope Francis’s decision to involve lay women and men in Church governance. This teaching highlights his belief in <em data-start="22134" data-end="22146">synodality</em> (journeying together): the idea that the Holy Spirit speaks through all the People of God, not only the hierarchy. By valuing such input, Leo&nbsp;XIV positions the Church to be more collaborative and responsive.<br data-start="22354" data-end="22357">
<em data-start="22357" data-end="22771">(Other notable wisdom: Leo&nbsp;XIV has emphasized that Church leaders must be close to Christ and their flock, use modern tools like social media wisely, and never lose sight of compassion. He also acknowledges the Church must continually learn and improve in confronting its failures, such as the abuse crisis<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://abc7chicago.com/post/2025-is-new-pope-cardinal-robert-francis-prevost-1st-american-chicago-elected-catholic-church-leader/16358670/#:~:text=offer%20at%20our%20meetings%20when,discuss%20the%20dossiers%20of%20candidates" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">abc7chicago.com</span></span></span></a></span> – a reminder that even legendary heroes must show accountability.)</em></p>
</li>
</ul>
<hr data-start="22773" data-end="22776" class="">
<p data-start="22778" data-end="23590" class=""><strong data-start="22778" data-end="22790">Sources:</strong> The information above is drawn from verified reports and publications, including Vatican News, Reuters, ABC/CNN, Catholic News Agency, and the <em data-start="22934" data-end="22945">Wikipedia</em> summary of Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV’s life, among others. These sources chronicle Robert F. Prevost’s remarkable journey from Chicago’s South Side altar boy to the Supreme Pontiff, offering insights into his character and contributions<span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Prevost#:~:text=Pope%20Leo%C2%A0XIV,to%20lead%20the%20Catholic%20Church" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">en.wikipedia.org</span></span></span></a></span><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Rev,commitment%20to%20social%20justice%20issues" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span><span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=importance%20of%20evangelization%20to%20help,the%20Church%20grow" target="_blank" rel="noopener" class="flex h-4.5 overflow-hidden rounded-xl px-2 text-[0.5625em] font-medium text-token-text-secondary! bg-[#F4F4F4]! dark:bg-[#303030]! transition-colors duration-150 ease-in-out"><span class="relative start-0 bottom-0 flex h-full w-full items-center"><span class="flex h-4 w-full items-center justify-between overflow-hidden" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="max-w-full grow truncate overflow-hidden text-center">reuters.com</span></span></span></a></span>. Through these milestones and traits, Pope Leo&nbsp;XIV emerges as not just a leader of the Catholic Church, but a legendary figure of faith – a pontiff with the <strong data-start="23444" data-end="23510">mind of a scholar, heart of a pastor, and soul of a missionary</strong>. <span class="ms-1 inline-flex max-w-full items-center relative top-[-0.094rem] animate-[show_150ms_ease-in]"><a href="https://www.reuters.com/world/prevost-first-us-pope-supported-francis-shunned-spotlight-2025-05-08/#:~:text=Rev,commitment%20to%20social%20justice%20issues"
